summary: This mod adds the Elven Dragonbone set to Skyrim. You can craft the set at a forge once you have both; the Elven Smithing and Dragon Armor -perks. Now requires Dawnguard.
descriptionHtml:
====================
Now requires Dawnguard.
====================

This mod adds the Elven Dragonbone set to Skyrim. You can craft the set at a forge once you have both; the Elven Smithing and Dragon Armor -perks.

The armor is fairly light and a bit better than your standard Dragon *Scale* armor set. The armor requires both Elven Smithing and Dragon Armor Perks to be able to be crafted and it appears under Elven -section of the forge. Each armor piece requires dragonbone piece and a set of other materials.

This armor is based on the Bethesda's Skyrim Dawnguard DLC's Auriel Snow Elf Ivory Armor set so I have not done it from the scratch.
author: lautasantenni
